attributes.action: intervene to end the atrocities in war torn Somalia.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The TFG (Transitional Federal Government) in Somalia were installed to keep order and restore peace. Instead, they have openly battled insurgents resulting in the deaths of thousands of civilians in the crossfire, and are guilty of serious human rights crimes and violations such as unlawful kidnap and restriction of aid. 
Between the actions of the TFG and the rebel insurgents, the people of Somalia are dying from unnecessary violence, disease and famine. Sign this petition and give them a new hope of survival.
